item.title: WSL Setup
item.description: Set mount umask # /etc/wsl.conf [automount] enabled = true options = "metadata,umask=022" Documentation for the /etc/wsl.conf is *here Set ssh-agent 1st: Open powershell as administrator, and run: PS C:\> Start-Service ssh-agent PS C:\> Get-Service ssh-agent Status Name DisplayName ------ ---- ----------- Running ssh-agent OpenSSH Authentication Agent 2nd: Add your keys using the ssh-add command at the powershell 3rd: Download the latest ssh-agent-wsl version (to a windows folder) here 4th: Uncompress it to a folder of your choice (on windows side): C:\Users\loop0\bin
